scripts.lint: npm run lint:format; npm run lint:depcheck; npm run lint:eslint
scripts.lint:depcheck: echo .; npx depcheck .; echo ./webapp-ssr-engine; npx depcheck ./webapp-ssr-engine
scripts.lint:format: npm run lint:format/js; npm run lint:format/gitignore; npm run lint:format/properties; npm run lint:format/yaml
scripts.lint:format/yaml: git ls-files | grep '\.ya\?ml' | tee /dev/stderr | xargs -I {} yq -i -S -Y . {}
